content: **drops crochet blanket with zigzag pattern in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **measurements** narrow blanket pictured approx 85 cm x 160 cm / 33 5 x 63 wide blanket approx 105 cm x 160 cm / 41 5 x 63 **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 300-400 g colour no 36 amethyst mix 250-300 g colour no 01 off-white 200-250 g colour no 12 light blue 150-200 g colour no 35 lime 150-200 g colour no 07 orange 150-200 g colour no 41 purple/violet mix 100-150 g colour no 08 red 100-150 g colour no 04 purple 100-150 g colour no 20 plum drops crochet hook size 9 mm / m/n - or size needed to obtain 7 sts x 6 row = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 measured in the st direction not along middle of shawl **pattern links** swedish version 1 1 http //garnstudio com/lang/se/visoppskrift php d_nr=106&d_id=42&lang=se
